titleInfo.title: Multilingual Question Answering over Linked Data: QALD-4 Dataset

mods.abstract: This dataset comprises 250 natural language questions over DBpedia 3.9, annotated with SPARQL queries and answers. It was part of the QALD-4 open challenge: questions 1-200 constitute the training question set and questions 201-250 constitute the test question set.
